description:
Learn HTML5 and CSS3 and develop 7+2 Websites. The course is designed for Beginners from scratch to become professional HTML Web Developer and front end developers.

You are going to learn the topics with practical by developing the websites, end of each session you will develop the websites based on the topics. when you complete this course you can develop your own website and you will be fit to work as HTML Web Developer and Front end Web Developer.

The class begins with HTML, the mark-up language that is the basis of the entire web. Students will experience how to create web pages, including structuring page content and apply formatting styles using CSS to make web pages more beautiful and attractive.

Students should be prepared to cover a lot in a short time and to be ready to spend some time afterward reviewing the content on their own to solidify and build upon the skills taught in class.
title: web developer course - html5 css3 and build 7 + 2 websites
